text: Hi everybody, is there a way to check all the pages/landings urls created in a HubSpot portal even if those pages have been deleted?
Thanks <@U25PYL3Q8> I will try it :slightly_smiling_face:
What are you trying to accomplish with this? That can help me figure out how to assist you.
anybody know where I can find a list of keyboard shortcuts for the new design manager?
was really hoping for a multiple selections shortcut like in sublime it's `⌘` + `D`

Thanks <@U25PYL3Q8> Nicholas, we are taking care of a portal and already made a new website design, the old pages are about 200 and we need to make a list of them to the clients tell us what are the redirections they wish, we don't know if there is an easy way of getting this list instead of writing down one by one
I like the program <https://www.screamingfrog.co.uk/seo-spider/>
<@U2Q5LPHGS> You can scan a website and export the lists —
plus its good for all sorts of other things
So good, I know it but it didn't came up to mi mind for this, of course, thanks so much Nicholas!
Does anyone else have issues with HS forms sometimes not loading/appearing properly on page load?
Hey everyone.  I am trying to integrate a review plugin for one of our clients.  If any of you have had any success with a certain service, please let me know.  Thanks!
do you have an ad-blocker running?
Stupidly I don't
Sometimes i've found there is a delay and adblockers can stop it from showing. Other times I have seen where a JS error causes it not to show up.
<@U26BSJCH4> I’ve used Feefo. But nothing fancy. They provided a bit of js that I just placed in the page and reviews wore automatically pulled in.
Thank you
appreciate it
I think the best thing to always do is have your embed forms use the target
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/advanced_form_options>
I have much better success at them showing up when I use target
<@U2Q5LPHGS> pinned a message to this channel.

if the old site is in HubSpot, you can try going to Website Pages, click Analyze, and to the right of “Top pages viewed” is an export button that should export all of the page URLs and other info for you. There should be a separate export button for Landing Pages too.

Hey HS staff I'm running into a strange issue when it comes to coded email templates. That appears to be related to something that happens upon sending the email (does not happen in the preview or preview page.) I've also tested the email in a third party email tester both sending through HubSpot and by directly uploading the code.

When the email is sent through HubSpot a table appears to get closed early, breaking the layouts. and I can confirm the code is different when inspected in gmail after being sent through HubSpot.

Here is the email preview page
<http://www.bbdcpa.com/-temporary-slug-91c804c7-dfb9-432f-b5dc-3d3b0b8e044e?hs_preview=GziSqauZ-5462488615>

Here is a screenshot from outlook
<https://ol2010.capture.litmuscdn.com/ec924db1-d2a8-4784-b5d6-b59a2ef54c14/results/ol2010-vertical-allowed-1366.png>

As you can see once you hit the text that says beginning of image and text modules - it breaks. 
This issue is not specific to outlook it happens across the board. One would assume I've got something going on with my code but it appears it's something that only happens when sending from HubSpot. Will test with Mailchimp  shortly.

I can confirm the issue ONLY occurs when an email is SENT through HubSpot. It DOES NOT happen when sent from Mailchimp. 

Code is exactly the same, no changes whatsoever.
This code displays broken upon sending through HubSpot - displays fine in HS preview, and web page however. This same code displays as expected in MailChimp and third party testing tools.
is there maybe some hubl i can wrap my code in to prevent HS from trying to pre-process anything?

Hey <@U7SL518D6>, a number of HubSpot employees hang out here and try to help when we have time, bit in general you should use regular HubSpot Support channels when you have an issue. These Slack channels are primarily intended for HubSpot customers to connect and help each other.
thanks, I'll try normal HS support, just figured with a more technical issue like this it may be better to jump to developers first.
does HS help out with coded html email templates ?
